category: Competition registration regulations/Article 28 (Registration termination and cancellation)
contents: Article 28 (Registration Termination and Cancellation) ① If a competitor is subject to disciplinary action such as expulsion, dismissal, or suspension of qualifications pursuant to Article 27 of the Sports Fair Committee Regulations, the member sport organization must immediately cancel the registration of the competitor. Revised on June 16, 2022. ② If there is a defect in the athlete registration process or if the athlete has not been active after registration, he/she may request cancellation of registration from the member sports organization. Revised February 10, 2023. ③ Member sports organizations must establish standards and procedures for cancellation of registration, including defects in the registration process, participation in training and competitions, etc. Newly established 2023. 2. 10.
